name: SnowReportforLovelandSkiArea
0:
”Alexa, open Loveland Ski Area”
”Alexa, ask Loveland Ski Area for the snow report”

Invocation Name: loveland ski area
des: The Loveland Ski Area Snow Report brought to you by SnoCountry brings you the latest snow fall, snow surface conditions, base depth, trail, and lift operations information.
